packageName: Hubitat → Xbar App for the Apple  macOS™ Menubar
author: Kurt Sanders
releaseNotes:
After this HPM upgrade, you must manually upgrade the Xbar plugin 'Hubitat_XBar.5m.py' to this same 1.0.3 release in the Xbar plugin directory. Please follow the install instructions in the documentation.

This release has the following improvements:

• Removed '.local' from polled machine name.

• Removed corrupt sensors/devices that do not have a valid/expected capability value.

• New → Added cloud API access string for users who are outside their home hub's local network.

• New → Added a debug option to view all selected device/sensors and preferences as an HTML page at bottom of the 'API Access Setup' page
